name: AngiePuffy Quest
overview: AngiePuffy Quest is a side scrolling platformer for the Commodore 64. It was developed by retrogamer1975 and released to the public domain in 2020. Story: AngiePuffy lives on a small farm with her animals. One day a gang of villains came and took all of them. Now she needs to find and save them before they are gone for good. Collect all the keys you can find to open the locks holding them captive. All the keys on each level is needed to unlock it and rescue the animal.
